question: What is the time complexity of binary search in a sorted array?
options:
a. O(n)
b. O(log n)
c. O(n^2)

question: Which data structure is commonly used to implement a stack?
options:
a. Array
b. Linked List
c. Both

question: What is the base case in recursion?
options:
a. The condition to stop recursion
b. The first recursive call
c. The case that triggers infinite recursion

question: Which algorithm is used to find the shortest path in a graph?
options:
a. Dijkstra's Algorithm
b. Kruskal's Algorithm
c. Floyd-Warshall Algorithm

question: What is the space complexity of the merge sort algorithm?
options:
a. O(1)
b. O(log n)
c. O(n)

question: Which of the following is a divide-and-conquer algorithm?
options:
a. Merge Sort
b. Quick Sort
c. Both

question: What is a greedy algorithm?
options:
a. An algorithm that tries all possibilities
b. An algorithm that makes the locally optimal choice at each step
c. An algorithm that backtracks to find the best solution

question: What is the worst-case time complexity of bubble sort?
options:
a. O(n)
b. O(n log n)
c. O(n^2)

question: What is the purpose of a hashing function?
options:
a. To sort data efficiently
b. To map data to a fixed-size value
c. To compress data

question: Which traversal algorithm is used to visit all nodes in a graph level by level?
options:
a. Depth-First Search
b. Breadth-First Search
c. Topological Sort
